mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (ORDER_NUM, MEMBER_ID, RESERVE_NAME, RESERVE_TELL, ORDER_DATE) VALUES (#{orderNum}, #{memberId}, #{reserveName} , #{reserveTell}, sysdate)

INSERT INTO ORDERLIST (ORDER_NUM, PRODUCT_NUM, CATEGORY_NUM, RESERVE_TIME, CHEKIN, CHEKOUT, RESERVE_DATE, SEATE_NUM) VALUES (19, #{productNum}, #{categoryNum} , #{reserveTime}, #{checkIn},#{checkOut},#{reserveDate},#{seateNum})

INSERT INTO PAYMENT (PAY_NUM, ORDER_NUM, CARD_NUM, PAY_PRICE, CARD_TERM,CARD_NAME,PAY_DATE) VALUES ((select nvl(max(PAY_NUM),0) +1 from PAYMENT),#{orderNum}, #{cardNum}, #{payPrice} , #{cardTerm}, #{cardName}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select SEATE_NUM from ORDERLIST where PRODUCT_NUM=#{no}

select r.RESERVE_TIME, r.CHEKIN, r.CHEKOUT, r.RESERVE_DATE, r.SEATE_NUM,t.MOVIE_IMAGE,t.MOVIE_TITEL from ORDERS o join ORDERLIST r on(o.ORDER_NUM=r.ORDER_NUM) join DATEPRODUCT D on(r.PRODUCT_NUM=d.PRODUCT_NUM) join DATEMOVIE m on(d.PRODUCT_NUM=m.PRODUCT_NUM) join MOVIE t on(m.MOVIE_NUM=t.MOVIE_NUM)
where member_id = #{member}
